segments.text: Looking at this scene, I notice the boy climbing on that little stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up to the open cabinet where the cookie jar is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is full of cookies, and he's grabbing one with his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, maybe to catch more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm up, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems excited, standing there so eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, with the woman not even looking their way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet from the sink, which makes it even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they not see the puddle right there?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the kids if that stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real disaster any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
